text: Group 2 of UEFA Euro 1988 contained the Soviet Union, the Netherlands, the Republic of Ireland, and England. Matches were played from 12 to 18 June 1988. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Team ! Method of qualification ! Date of qualification ! data-sort-type="number" | Finals appearance ! Last appearance !
